titleStmt.title: By the King and Queens Authority. These are to give notice, that here is lately arrived an experienced and most famous High-German doctor, who by his great study, and constant practice in several parts of the world, as well in princes courts as in hospitals, and war-like expeditions, hath obtained such a physical method, as to cure all external and internal distempers (if curable)....

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Imprint from Wing. Wing gives two imprint dates and two settings, 1689 and 1694.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
